alert.note: Alert for Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 12:58PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Vance, southern Warren and Franklin Counties through 145 PM EST... At 1257 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kittrell to near Wake Forest. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Louisburg, Franklinton, Kittrell, Youngsville, Centerville, Ingleside, Gillburg, Afton and South Henderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued.
